eu_initiatives: The Public Affairs Council does not carry out any lobbying or interest representation activities. We organize events and conferences in Europe to advance the profession of public affairs, occasionally inviting EU officials or MEPs as guest speakers.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: We organize a large number of conferences, webinars and other events about various aspects of public affairs methodology and best practices. Being a neutral, nonpolitical association, we do not represent any interest of our own or of our members.
goals__remit:
The Public Affairs Council is the leading nonpartisan, nonpolitical association for public affairs professionals worldwide.  
 
Launched in 1954, our mission is to advance the field of public affairs and to provide members with the executive education and expertise they need to succeed while maintaining the highest ethical standards. 
 
The Council’s staff professionals have direct experience in corporate and association public affairs management, lobbying, global public affairs, social media, corporate responsibility, campaign finance, grassroots advocacy, crisis communication and a host of related areas.
